H0.text: There are three types of rock. Sedimentary is one, give one of the others.. Foliated Rock

H1.text: There are three types of rock. Sedimentary is one, give one of the others.. Hydrothermal Rock

H2.text: There are three types of rock. Sedimentary is one, give one of the others.. Plutonic Rock

H3.text: There are three types of rock. Sedimentary is one, give one of the others.. IGNEOUS OR METAMORPHIC

A4.text: Igneous rock is one of the three main rock types, the others being sedimentary and metamorphic.

A5.text: Metamorphic rock is a rock that was subjected to heat and pressure.
